TRILUMINOS PRO enhances the reproduction of over a billion accurate colors, resulting in natural and precise picture quality. Google TV with Google Assistant organizes all of your content in one location. Stream from your Apple device using AirPlay 2. With Dolby Vision and Atmos support, you can enjoy immersive cinematic content. With the optional BRAVIA CAM, you can video chat with friends and family and use Gesture Control for continuous control without a remote.

Google TV with Google Assistant

The Sony Bravia KD-65X85K is a 65-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV from Sony. You get access to the Google Play store and a slew of multimedia apps with Google TV, so you can broaden your content horizons. It also enables you to use Google Assistant with your voice. Simply say "OK Google" into the included voice remote to search for movies, TV shows, and music by title or genre, or have Google TV suggest titles for you. It can even control smart home devices that are compatible with it.

Motionflow XR

The Sony Bravia KD-65X85K 65" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV has a 120 Hz refresh rate, which helps keep sports, action movies, and other fast-paced content smooth and blur-free, but Motionflow XR goes even further. Motionflow XR keeps the sharp details in fast-paced scenes by creating extra frames on the fly and weaving them in between the source material. As a result, the experience is smooth, seamless, and realistic.

HDMI 2.1

The Sony Bravia KD-65X85K is a 65-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV from Sony. The X85K supports HDMI 2.1 connectivity, giving you access to 4K 120 Hz content, eARC, VRR, and ALLM technologies. With eARC, an audio signal is sent back to an optional receiver or soundbar, reducing extra cabling and streamlining your setup. VRR and ALLM are excellent choices for gaming. It Sees blur-free picture quality in fast-moving sports and movies with a native 120Hz refresh rate and Motionflow XR technology. Get the advantage of high-performance gaming with 4K/120, VRR, and ALLM as specified in HDMI 2.1. TRILUMINOS PRO enhances the reproduction of over a billion accurate colors, resulting in natural and precise picture quality. Google TV with Google Assistant organizes all of your content in one location. Stream from your Apple device using AirPlay 2. With Dolby Vision and Atmos support, you can enjoy immersive cinematic content. With the optional BRAVIA CAM, you can video chat with friends and family and use Gesture Control for continuous control without a remote.

Google TV with Google Assistant

The Sony Bravia KD-85X85K is an 85-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV from Sony. You get access to the Google Play store and a slew of multimedia apps with Google TV, so you can broaden your content horizons. It also enables you to use Google Assistant with your voice. Simply say "OK Google" into the included voice remote to search for movies, TV shows, and music by title or genre, or have Google TV suggest titles for you. It can even control smart home devices that are compatible with it.

Motionflow XR

The Sony Bravia KD-85X85K 85" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV has a 120 Hz refresh rate, which helps keep sports, action movies, and other fast-paced content smooth and blur-free, but Motionflow XR goes even further. Motionflow XR keeps the sharp details in fast-paced scenes by creating extra frames on the fly and weaving them in between the source material. As a result, the experience is smooth, seamless, and realistic.

HDMI 2.1

The Sony Bravia KD-85X85K is an 85-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV from Sony. The X85K supports HDMI 2.1 connectivity, giving you access to 4K 120 Hz content, eARC, VRR, and ALLM technologies. With eARC, an audio signal is sent back to an optional receiver or soundbar, reducing extra cabling and streamlining your setup. VRR and ALLM are excellent choices for gaming. ALLM can automatically switch your TV settings to a low-latency game mode, while VRR automatically adjusts the refresh rate to match the video source.

Dolby Vision & Atmos

The Sony Bravia KD-85X85K 85" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV has An advanced home theater experience that is possible with Dolby Vision supplying rich and realistic HDR visuals, while Dolby Atmos lets you create an encompassing surround sound experience in your home.

X-Balanced Speakers & Ambient Optimization

Dual distinctively shaped bass reflex speakers are designed to be small enough to fit inside the X85K while still producing 20W of clear and powerful sound. Ambient optimization technology uses light and color sensors to automatically adjust the picture and sound to fit the size of your room.

BRAVIA CAM

The Sony Bravia KD-85X85K 85" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV supports the optional BRAVIA CAM, allowing you to video chat with friends and family while controlling the TV with physical movements via Gesture Control.

Eco-Friendly

The Sony Bravia KD-85X85K 85" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TVs bezel is made using recycled plastic, while multiple advanced technologies are implemented to minimize power consumption. This Television has No Parts Warranty.

This smart television features Quantum Matrix Technology, which accurately regulates our proprietary new Quantum Mini LED. With precise light adjustment, you can experience fine detail in both the darkest and brightest environments. You can see all you enjoy upscaled to spectacular 8K with the AI-bases processor. Action movies, sports, and games look smooth and fluid up to 8K at 120 Hz. You can experience depth and dimension on the screen just like you do in real life thanks to the Real Depth Enhancer.

Neural Quantum Processor 8K

Samsung 85QN900B 85" Neo QLED 8K Smart TV's advanced multi-intelligent processor creates the best 8K viewing experience. Instead of one neural network to analyze visual data, Neo Quantum Processor 8K uses data generated from 20 neural networks to enhance every visual detail of your 8K content.

Real 8K Resolution and Quantum HDR 64x

The Samsung 85QN900B Smart TV allows you to feel the power of each frame with 33 million pixels of ultimate clarity and a resolution four times that of 4K. Quantum HDR 64x establishes a new standard for extraordinary detail and brightness. Enjoy vibrant, accurate color as well as deeper contrast and crisp detail. HDR10dynamic +'s tone mapping shifts color and contrast scene by scene, allowing you to appreciate even the most subtle nuances.

Dolby Atmos and Object Tracking Sound Pro

Samsung 85QN900B's top channel speakers deliver a next-level Dolby Atmos experience that will immerse you inside the action with multi-dimensional sound. Immerse you deeper into your listening experience on all corners of the TV, including the center, without missing any audio clue.

Exceptional motion enhancements in 4K 120Hz

The Samsung 85QN900B 85" Neo QLED 8K Smart TV features Motion Xcelerator Turbo+. Conquer every enemy, even at soaring speeds. With exceptional motion enhancements up to 4K 120Hz, you can enjoy gameplay with ultra-smooth action without lag and motion blur.

FreeSync Premium Pro

Samsung 85QN900B comes with Certified AMD FreeSync Premium Pro core technology, you'll experience reduced stutter and screen tearing as well as a superior combination of smooth gaming at peak performance, exceptional high dynamic range visuals and low latency for true game-winning performance.

full_description:
Sony Bravia XR 55A80K 55" 4K Ultra HD Android Smart OLED Alexa Compatible Google TV

The Sony Bravia XR 55A80K 55" 4K Ultra HD Android Smart OLED TV is a high-end television with exceptional image quality and a plethora of smart features. OLED display technology offers deep blacks, rich colors, and a wide viewing angle. The 4K resolution is four times that of Full HD, resulting in very clear and detailed pictures. This 55-inch TV is also compatible with Alexa and Google TV, allowing you to operate it with voice commands and access a variety of streaming services like as Netflix, Amazon Prime, and YouTube. This TV also runs Android, so you can visit the Google Play Store and download your favorite applications and games.

4K OLED

Whatever you view will be upscaled to near-4K8 resolution thanks to our proprietary Cognitive Processor XR. You'll also enjoy the strong contrast of our OLED screen of XR 55A80K TV, which is carefully controlled by our unique technology to provide true-to-life depth and beautiful blacks in every image.

Cognitive Processor XR & XR OLED Contrast Pro

Take your vision and sound to the next level with Cognitive Processor XR. Our breakthrough processing on Sony BRAVIA XR TVs reproduces material in the same way that people perceive and hear, providing an extraordinarily lifelike experience. It knows how the human eye concentrates, evaluating images to provide real-life depth, remarkable contrast, and stunningly brilliant colors. XR OLED Contrast Pro improves color and contrast in bright regions, resulting in highly realistic images defined by absolute clean blacks and maximum brightness. With a temperature sensor and a high brightness panel, this Bravia XR 55A80K OLED TV uses our Cognitive Processor XR to detect screen temperature and accurately manage light, ensuring that pixels in bright areas are lighted at the same time.

Auto Low Latency Mode

The Sony Bravia XR 55A80K 55 Inch TV With Auto Low Latency Mode in HDMI 2.1, BRAVIA recognizes when a console is connected and powered on, and automatically switches to low latency mode. You'll enjoy smoother, more responsive gameplay – vital for fast-moving, high-intensity games.

Variable Refresh Rate

The Sony Bravia XR 55A80K 55" 4K Ultra HD Android Smart TV has a variable refresh rate in HDMI 2.1, preventing stuttering and screen tearing. This TV dynamically changes the display refresh rate to match the gaming device's varied frame rates, resulting in smoother gameplay.

Acoustic Center Sync

When you connect a BRAVIA XR 55A80K TV to a Sony soundbar, the soundbar amplifies the center speaker channel, resulting in crisper and richer voices. This allows sound to closely match on-screen action, providing a totally immersive experience.

Ready for 360 Spatial Sound

Customize your Dolby Atmos experience by pairing our SRS-NS7 wearable speaker with the BRAVIA XR for spatial surround sound. With certain Sony headphones, you can additionally enjoy the simulated surround of 360 Spatial Sound via Wireless Transmitter WLA-NS7 (available separately).

Bluetooth connectivity

The Sony Bravia XR 55A80K 55" 4K Ultra HD Android Smart TV Connect Bluetooth-compatible devices to your TV for easy wire-free entertainment. Pair your Bluetooth headphones or earphones with BRAVIA and enjoy TV shows and music in your favorite place - without any disturbances or interruptions.

Google TV

The Sony Bravia XR 55A80K 55" 4K Ultra HD Android Smart TV with Browse 700,000+ movies and TV episodes from across your streaming services, all in one place and organized into topics and genres based on what interests you.

Chromecast built-in

Switch from your phone, tablet, or laptop to your TV in an instant. Chromecast allows you to cast all of your favorite movies, programs, applications, games, and other content right to your television.

Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos

The Sony Bravia XR 55A80K 55" 4K Ultra HD Android Smart TV with Enjoy cinematic thrills at home. Dolby Vision brings scenes vividly to life for authentic viewing, while Dolby Atmos fills the room with immersive surround sound.
